solution_line_template: The number of open parking spots on the second level is {first_level_spots} spots + {second_level_more} spots = <<{first_level_spots}+{second_level_more}={second_level_spots}>>{second_level_spots} spots.

The number of open parking spots on the third level is {second_level_spots} spots + {third_level_more} spots = <<{second_level_spots}+{third_level_more}={third_level_spots}>>{third_level_spots} spots.

There are {first_level_spots} spots + {second_level_spots} spots + {third_level_spots} spots + {fourth_level_spots} spots = <<{first_level_spots}+{second_level_spots}+{third_level_spots}+{fourth_level_spots}={total_spots}>>{total_spots} open parking spots in all.
